question: The "Morne Diablotin National Park" is located in which country?
explanation: Morne Diablotin National Park is located in the north-west of Dominica, officially the Commonwealth of Dominica. This national park is Dominica's third national park. This national park houses Morne Diablotin, named after the Dominican creole word for Black-capped Petrel, which is the tallest peak and largest volcano in Dominica and stands at 4747 feet above sea level. This national park was established primarily to protect the habitat of the critically endangered sisserou parrot species, an endemic bird species and national bird of Dominica.
